snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo does not need the State Legislature to act in order to increase the minimum wage.
abstract: Editorial urges New York Gov Andrew Cuomo to increase state's minimum wage by authorizing his state labor commissioner to convene a wage board to bring about changes to wage rules; holds by bypassing State Legislature, Cuomo has a good tool in battle for fair wages.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo does not need the State Legislature to act in order to increase the minimum wage.

headline.print_headline: How to Raise Wages in New York
headline.main: How to Raise Wages in New York
